title: Set up your first 3D printer
description: Accept Sydney's offer of a 3D printer, and learn how to set it up for use in your space exploration adventure.

dialogue.text: Hello, friend! I'm Sydney, a 3D printing expert with the metaguild. dChat referred me. I've got a proposition for you: how would you like to have your very own 3D printer?

options.text: A 3D printer? That sounds amazing! Tell me more.
A 3D printer? How would that help me?

dialogue.text: Fantastic! A 3D printer is an invaluable tool for space exploration. It can create tools, equipment, and even spare parts for your ship. The printer is fully assembled and calibrated, so all you need to do is complete a test print.

A 3D printer can be a game-changer in not only space exploration but a ton of other industries. It allows you to create tools, equipment, and spare parts on demand. I've got a fully assembled and calibrated printer for you. All you need to do is complete a test print to see its capabilities.

options.text: Alright, let's give it a try.

dialogue.text: First things first, I need you to accept the 3D printer. It's fully assembled and calibrated, so you're ready to go. Just take it and we'll proceed.

options.text: I've got the 3D printer and some PLA filament! What's next?

dialogue.text: For your test print, I recommend printing a Benchy. It's a small boat model often used to validate 3D printer setups. Once you've successfully printed Benchy, we'll know your 3D printer is ready for action.

options.text: I've printed the Benchy! What's next?

dialogue.text: Great job! You're all set to use your 3D printer for your space exploration adventures. If you need help or tips on 3D printing, feel free to reach out. Good luck!

options.text: Thanks, Sydney! I appreciate your help.
